is.hello.buruberi.bluetooth.stacks.util

Class Bytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hello.buruberi.bluetooth.stacks.util.Bytes

  • public final class Bytes
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for converting arrays of bytes to and from Strings.

                                        int start,
                                        int end)
        Converts a subsection of an array of bytes to a string of the format 0122FF

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes)
        Converts an entire array of bytes to a string of the format 0122FF

      • fromString

        public static byte[] fromString(java.lang.String string)
        Converts a string of the format 0122FF to an array of bytes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on invalid input.

      • tryFromString

        public static byte[] tryFromString(java.lang.String string)
        Converts a string of the format 0122FF to an array of bytes.

        The same as fromString(String), but it does not throw exceptions.

        Returns:
        A byte[] array if the string could be converted; null otherwise.

      • startWith

        public static boolean startWith(byte[] haystack,
                                byte[] needle)
        Determines if a given byte array starts with another given byte array.
        Parameters:
        haystack - The byte array to check.
        needle - The byte array the haystack should start with.
        Returns:
        true if haystack started with needle; false otherwise.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(byte[] haystack,
                               byte needle)
        Searches a given byte array for a given byte.
        Parameters:
        haystack - The array to search.
        needle - The byte to search for.
        Returns:
        true if the array contained the byte; false otherwise.
